Register View¶

tracktivityPetsWebsite.views.register.register(request)[source]¶

The register method renders and returns a registration form to sign up to Tracktivity Pets. If the user is already logged in, they are redirected to their dashboard.

This method is also used to accept the POST requests from the form. If the form is not valid, a message is sent back to the users browser.
